column4: vmware server runs in the background, don't need the window running for the machine to be up, also you can make new machines in server, player only plays existing machines
so the server version is better then ? I suppose you can still bring a window up ?
have you used the server version on ubuntu ?
yes, i use vmware server on ubuntu
yes the install is rather easy
thx, i'm gonna download it now.
is there a guide for vmware server install somewhere ?
is there anything about that that you dont' understand?
I'll wait for the downloads to finish and then tackle the install
the biggies is apt-get install build-essential xinetd and the linux-headers for your kernel
thks, I have build essentials, i'll just have to install linux headers.
i'll have to install xinetd as well
